title: Step 17

challengeFiles.name: main
challengeFiles.contents:
def verify_card_number(card_number):
    sum_of_odd_digits = 0
    card_number_reversed = card_number[::-1]
    
def main():
    card_number = '4111-1111-4555-1142'
    card_translation = str.maketrans({'-': '', ' ': ''})
    translated_card_number = card_number.translate(card_translation)

    verify_card_number(translated_card_number)

main()

tests.text: You should have odd_digits = card_number_reversed[::2] within the verify_card_number function.

description: Within the verify_card_number function, create a variable odd_digits that contains every other digit of the card_number_reversed string.
